page.title: 14PLAYGROUND GAMES
page.content: The children at our school play a lot of different games at the interval and at lunchtime. One of these games is called RELIEVERS. You need two teams of children, one team chases the other. Once a member of the team is caught they go into the 'den' and they have to wait there until someone from their own team taps them on the shoulder and shouts 'tig', then they are free. However if all of the team are caught then it is the turn of the team who did the chasing to now go and hide and the team who have been caught seek them out. Another game is CHINKS, similar to the high jump except that elastic bands tied between two people are used instead of a bar and two poles. Seven different heights are used. The winners are those who can jump the highest.
